main event: A yellow object, size of a baseball, was observed traveling in a straight path before disappearing suddenly.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object was observed visually during the night., It was seen about 6-12 degrees above the horizon., The witness was a housewife aged 35., The object made no sound and did not exhibit any erratic movement.
sighted object: a yellow, round object the size of a baseball
